src:
Opus utser ny President, Vehicle Inspection U.S.
Opus kan med tillfredsställelse meddela att vi har utsett Andy McIntosh till President för  bolagets amerikanska bilprovningsverksamhet.
03 Nov 2019, 20:44 by Opus Group

text:
Opus Appoints New President, Vehicle Inspection U.S.
Opus is pleased to announce that we have appointed Andy McIntosh as President of the Company's US car testing business.
03 Nov 2019, 20:44 by Opus Group
